author: Lillian Rizzo
title: Footwear Retailer The Walking Company Files ‘Chapter 22’ Bankruptcy
text:
The Walking Company Holdings Inc., a chain specializing in comfortable footwear, sought chapter 11 protection for the second time in a decade Tuesday, the latest mall-based retailer hurt by the consumer shift to online shopping.
The retailer filed for protection in U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Wilmington, Del., having already agreed to the terms of a chapter 11 plan with its key creditors that includes a $10 million equity investment and $50 million in bankruptcy and exit financing so the company’s stores can stay open during the...
